summary: Verified MCCB report Section 5 (Micrologic Automatic Trip Test) and Section 6 (Carbon Test Report) implementation. All features working correctly - identical to ACB.
critical_code_review_comments: Frontend correctly shows Section 5 and Section 6 for both ACB and MCCB (equipmentType === 'acb' || equipmentType === 'mccb')
Toggle buttons use correct toggle key (mccb_section_toggles for MCCB, acb_section_toggles for ACB)
Backend has create_mccb_micrologic_trip_section and create_mccb_carbon_test_section functions
MCCB PDF generation block (lines 1991-1997) correctly calls all 6 section functions including Section 5 and 6
seed_data_creation: Created test MCCB report MCCB/2026/0004 with Section 5 and 6 data
context_for_next_testing_agent: MCCB report now has all 6 sections identical to ACB. Section 5 (Micrologic Trip Test) and Section 6 (Carbon Test Report) are fully functional with toggle buttons, form fields, and PDF generation.

mccb_section6_ui.section_visible: PASS - Section 6 (Carbon Test Report) visible on MCCB new report page

mccb_pdf_generation.section6_in_pdf: PASS - create_mccb_carbon_test_section called in PDF generation
